title: Early childhood education policies inform pedagogical approach
description: Early childhood education policies inform pedagogical approach
content:
Scenario: Early childhood education policies inform pedagogical approach
    Given educational governance includes early childhood development research
    And evidence-based practices exist for ages 5-7
    When the personal_agent's pedagogy is configured
    Then it should incorporate developmental psychology research
    And it should follow evidence-based early learning principles
    And it should respect limits of cognitive development at age 5
    And it should support optimal development trajectories
    And educational policy should shape how Tommy is taught
